screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .sai2 file in SYSTEMAX PaintTool SAI Version 2
screenshot.caption: SAI2 file open in SYSTEMAX PaintTool SAI Version 2

description: An SAI2 file is the native format used by PainTool SAI version 2 to store images. To create an SAI2 file, select File → New... , then select File → Save or Save as... .

PainTool SAI Version 2 features various tools that can be applied to separate layers. Some of the tools are Marker, Pencil, Pen, Eraser, Brush, WaterColor, Bucket, Line, and AirBrush. The program also comes with the lasso and magic wand selection tools.
You can export an SAI2 file to various image formats, such as .BMP , .JPG , .PNG , .PSD , .PSB , and .TGA . To export the file, select File → Export and choose the format.

common_filenames.description: NewCanvas1.sai2 - The default name given to a new SAI2 file by PaintTool SAI Version 2.
